pullRequest.body:
In the context of idempotent completion of categories and the Dold-Kan equivalence, constructing some isomorphisms was very slow in Lean 3 but has been much faster in Lean 4, while using equalities of functors in Lean 3 was fast, but in Lean 4 it became very slow. In this PR, we switch to using mostly isomorphisms of functors: this also became necessary in order to make the refactor #8531 possible.

---


<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->

nodes.body:
Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/ec1c82ef-e52a-430a-804d-3fb51d2e87be) for commit ed4ddbe10ba56e62d9d13b36a335f8a49c905c85.
The entire run failed.
Found no significant differences.

Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/5fbb9886-976c-4770-ab5d-69ac797273ee) for commit 9043f947de191f4c6f7b2ed776a80a925a0a5176.
There were [significant changes](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/compare/01914ce0-343f-489f-9ebb-7f0dce4e0005/to/5fbb9886-976c-4770-ab5d-69ac797273ee) against commit d0c0a7f4f2aff89c2eb5bec7a922fd9417036bbb:
```diff
  Benchmark                                                     Metric          Change
  ====================================================================================
+ build                                                         type checking    -7.3%
- open Mathlib                                                  wall-clock        6.4%
+ ~Mathlib.AlgebraicTopology.DoldKan.EquivalencePseudoabelian   instructions    -49.3%
- ~Mathlib.AlgebraicTopology.DoldKan.FunctorN                   instructions    141.8%
- ~Mathlib.AlgebraicTopology.DoldKan.GammaCompN                 instructions    119.1%
+ ~Mathlib.AlgebraicTopology.DoldKan.NCompGamma                 instructions    -86.7%
- ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Idempotents.FunctorExtension          instructions    116.1%
```
I think your motivation for this PR should be recorded in the commit history. Do you agree? If so, please move it above the `---` fold.

:v: joelriou can now approve this pull request. To approve and merge a pull request, simply reply with `bors r+`. More detailed instructions are available [here](https://bors.tech/documentation/getting-started/#reviewing-pull-requests).

Thanks for the suggestion!

bors merge

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/6981894769/job/18999948818)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/6981894769/job/18999948103)
  * [Check all files imported](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/6981894769/job/18999948328)

LGTM, but please see my comment above.

bors d+

LGTM, but please see my comment above.

bors d+
